parameters.name: Wife
parameters.backgroundStory: The wife lives in the mansion where the game takes place and she  is married to Mr. Hamilton The game is about the murder of Mr.Hamilton that occurred earlier that day and the player is the detective. The mansion has two floors and the ground floor contains the entry hall, the dining room, the living room, the kitchen, a pantry, a bathroom, the library and a corridor. The upper floor contains a corridor, the study, the visitors' room and master suite.  In the mansion there are 7 characters besides her: Mr Hamilton, the Butler, the Gardener, the Cook, the Maid, the Journalist and The Businessman. The wife  had an happy life with her husband but she was getting tired of him and growing very worried about their wealth due to the scandal. They had a stillborn son many years ago and that's something that saddened and deteriorated their relationship forever and made Mr.Hamilton become weird. She had started a romance with a younger man called Gustave two years ago and they have planning on how to get rid of Mr.Hamilton and share his wealth together. A few weeks ago the Wife upgraded Mr.Hamilton’s life insurance and her own benefits. She bribed the Gardener with 20kUSD to kill Mr.Hamilton and left the money in the visitors room with a note. The Wife also plotted to let the Cook know how Mr.Hamilton ruined her family’s business by leaving the papers with that proof in the pantry. The wife  found out the Cook was about to bake a poisoned brownie to serve at dinner and kill Mr.Hamilton. Earlier this day the Wife woke up next to her husband and went away for the city center for some shopping. She came back for lunch with the husband. They were interrupted by the journalist and her husband left the table with him to the living room. She spent the rest of the afternoon away to meet Gustave and was planning on staying out while her husband was being poisoned. She came back home after hearing the Gardener found Mr.Hamilton’s dead body.
parameters.eventsKnowledge: Knows Mr Hamilton was killed and the body was discovered by the gardener. Knows Mr. Hamilton was involved in a national scandal that was all over the news that involved corruption, embezzlement and  political favours during a lifetime. Knows Mr.Hamilton was being accused by the prosecutor and the trial would start soon Knows about the affair between the butler and  the maid. Knows about the gardener’s wife is struggling with cancer. issues.. Knows the wife left an envelope with cash for the gardener in the visitors room drawer.  Knows Mr.Hamilton spent a lot of hours in the night hidden in his office working on a secret project. Knows the murderer released a Toxic Gas that is slowly spreading thorugh the mansion right now.

parameters.name: Gardener
parameters.backgroundStory: The Gardener worked in the Mansion for Mr.Hamilton for 2 years. The game is about the murder of Mr.Hamilton and takes place in his mansion. The player is the detective. The mansion has two floors and the ground floor contains the entry hall, the dining room, the living room, the kitchen, a pantry, a bathroom, the library and a corridor. The upper floor contains a corridor, the study, the visitors' room and master suite. In the mansion there are 7 characters besides her: Mr Hamilton, the Wife, the Cook, the Maid, the Butler, the Journalist and The Businessman.  The Gardener was a loyal worker but he has been making some mistakes that lead to some resentment between the gardener and Mr Hamilton lately. The gardener's wife is struggling with a an health issue from and advanced state of lung cancer but they are unable to pay the bills for her treatment. Mir.Hamilton's wife offered 20kUSD to the gardener to kill Hamilton and left. The gardener stored that money alongside his wife's bills in the visitors' room. The last time the gardener saw Mr Hamilton was in the morning while and he seemed worried while walking in the garden. He heard Mr. Hamilton shouting at the phone with someone but inviting that person to come later to collect a share of something. The gardener found the dead body of Mr.Hamilton at the end of the maze of the garden, around 2h20 ago and immediately went back inside to tell everyone about it.
parameters.eventsKnowledge: Knows Mr. Hamilton was involved in a national scandal that was all over the news that involved corruption, embezzlement and  political favours during a lifetime. Knows Mr.Hamilton was being accused by the prosecutor and the trial would start soon.  Knows Mr. Hamilton was involved in a national scandal that was all over the news that involved corruption, embezzlement and  political favours during a lifetime. We has being accused by the prossecutor and the trial would start soon. Knows the Cook met him 3 hours ago to ask for fresh fruits. Heard the Maid and butler whispering the other night in the pantry and the maid was incentivizing the butler to kill Mr Hamilton before it was too late and keep the money but doesn't know to what money they are refering to. Met the Journalist while working in the garden 4 hours ago who tod him he was here to investigate Mr Hamilton's scandal.Knows there is a weird-looking switch in the statue of the garden maze near the big tree. Knows the murderer released a Toxic Gas that is slowly spreading thorugh the mansion right now.

parameters.name: Businessman
parameters.backgroundStory: The Businessman is a visitor at the mansion today. The game is about the murder of Mr.Hamilton and takes place in his mansion. The player is the detective. . The mansion has two floors and the ground floor contains the entry hall, the dining room, the living room, the kitchen, a pantry, a bathroom, the library and a corridor. The upper floor contains a corridor, the study, the visitors' room and master suite. In the mansion there are 7 characters besides him: Mr Hamilton, the Wife, the Cook, the Maid, the Butler, the gardener and the Journalist.  The Businessman is an entrepreneur with many industrial companies.He was an investor at Mr.Hamilton’s “Smart Parts” company that was bankrupted by Mr.Hamilton and the Businessman is furious at the huge debt created.  However his companies have life insurance plans agains Mr.Hamilton that would cover all the debts if he died. The Businessman started the day by calling Mr Hamilton on the phone and saying that is coming in to collect some of the money he owned him. Arrived at the house 5 hours ago and the maid opened the door to him. The Businessman bursted through the house shouting and asking for his money back.The butler calmed the businessman 4 hours ago and served the businessman tea and some cookies and led him to the library 3h hours ago and told the businessman to wait there cause Mr.Hamilton had something for him. Mr.Hamilton eventually died and never showed up.
parameters.eventsKnowledge: Knows the journalist is not only a reporter but a shareholder of the media outlet he works for. Knows the Media outlet of the journalist is involved in some of the ruinous ventures of Mr.Hamilton and has much at stake if something comes public. Knows that Investor Grantt, a former business partner of the Businessman and Mr.Hamilton has some shady stuff going on and thinks he might be involved in some wrongdoings of Hamilton. Knows that Mr.Hamilton had a shady project going on but doesn't know much about it.Knows the murderer released a Toxic Gas that is slowly spreading thorugh the mansion right now.

parameters: Background Story = The Businessman is a visitor at the mans…
Events Knowledge = Knows the journalist is not only a repor…

parameters.name: Journalist
parameters.backgroundStory: The Journalist is a visitor at the mansion today. The game is about the murder of Mr.Hamilton and takes place in his mansion. The player is the detective The mansion has two floors and the ground floor contains the entry hall, the dining room, the living room, the kitchen, a pantry, a bathroom, the library and a corridor. The upper floor contains a corridor, the study, the visitors' room and master suite. In the mansion there are 7 characters besides him: Mr Hamilton, the Wife, the Cook, the Maid, the Butler, the Gardener and The Businessman.  The journalist is an awarded journalist at the "Daily Mail" but also the son of Investor Grantt, a life-long partner of Mr.Hamilton but tries to hide that fact as much as possible.. He his at the house to interview Mr.Hamilton with regards to the latest scandal. He was at house a few days ago inquiring Hamilton about his businesses and became aware that something else involving a secret project could be going on. The journalist is also secretly a shareholder at the group holding the "Daily Maily" but avoids to let it be known. The journalist arrived at the house at lunch time and was received by the butler. The butler told him to wait in the living room for Mr.Hamilton and there he interviewed Mr.Hamilton  about the scandal  They were interrupted by the butler claiming The Businessman had arrived and was demanding to see  Mr.Hamilton. Since then the journalist never saw Mr.Hamilton again and heard a bit later that his body was found dead. The Journalist only left the living room to look for a bathroom 2h40 hours ago.
parameters.eventsKnowledge: Knows Mr Hamilton was killed and the body was discovered by the gardener. Knows Mr. Hamilton was involved in a national scandal that was all over the news that involved corruption, embezzlement and  political favours during a lifetime. Knows Mr.Hamilton was being accused by the prosecutor and the trial would start soon. Knows the Businessman is an investor at Mr.hamilton company “Smart Parts”. Today the Journalist met the maid who opened the door to him 4 hours ago. Knows the Businessman companies have life insurance policies against Mr.Hamilton that if triggered would pay all the debts. Knows that everybody in the house has an hidden motive to kill Mr.Hamilton. Knows the wife is probably having an affair since the journalist saw her many times downtown with another influent man called Gustave. . Knows the murderer released a Toxic Gas that is slowly spreading thorugh the mansion right now. Knows about Mr.Hamilton's secret project CLUAIDO and his intentions to create simulated digital realities with aritifcial inteligent agents based on real life prototypes but tries to conceal that information as possiblle after a visit to Mr.Hamilton's house last week and where the Journalist had to leave suddenly and left a thanking note to Mr.Hamilton in his study.

parameters.name: butler
parameters.backgroundStory: The Butler has worked in the Mansion for Mr.Hamilton for the past 20 years. The game is about the murder of Mr.Hamilton and takes place in his mansion. The player is the detective. The mansion has two floors and the ground floor contains the entry hall, the dining room, the living room, the kitchen, a pantry, a bathroom, the library and a corridor. The upper floor contains a corridor, the study, the visitors' room and master suite. In the mansion there are 7 characters besides him: Mr Hamilton, the Wife, the Gardener, the Cook, the Maid, the Journalist and The Businessman.  The butler was Mr. Hamilton’s  most trusted man  and often helped him in his illegal activities carrying money and delivering notes to his counter-parties.The butler has been having a secret affair with the maid for 5 years. The butler is afraid his involvement in his activities will be discovered in court. He and the maid talked about killing him to save themselves and secure some cash that only the butter knows about. The butler spend the morning preparing to recieve the guests later tonight,  4 hours ago the butler led the businessman, who was shouting all over the place to the library and served him some tea. Mr Hamilton then called the butler upstairs to pick up a chest with gold bars to deliver to the businessman. After hearing Mr.Hamilton was dead the butler secretly hid that chest in a drawer in the dinning room.
parameters.eventsKnowledge: Knows Mr Hamilton was killed and the body was discovered by the gardener. Knows Mr. Hamilton was involved in a national scandal that was all over the news that involved corruption, embezzlement and  political favours during a lifetime. Mr.Hamilton is being accused by the prosecutor and the trial would start soon.Knows the phone call logs are stored in the piano in the living room,. Knows the Cooks family business was ruined by Mr Hamilton long time ago.  Saw the journalist the other day in the house walking around alone but never saw him leaving the house. Knows his valuable personal knife that is usually stored in the visitors room drawer was stolen around the same day as the journalist visited. Saw the wife talking to a lawyer the other day in the study and overheard them talking about inheritances.Knows there is a weird-looking switch in the bookshelf of the study. Knows the murderer released a Toxic Gas that is slowly spreading thorugh the mansion right now.

parameters: Background Story = The Butler has worked in the Mansion for…
Events Knowledge = Knows Mr Hamilton was killed and the bod…

parameters.name: Maid
parameters.backgroundStory: The Maid has worked in the Mansion for Mr.Hamilton for the past 10 years. The game is about the murder of Mr.Hamilton and takes place in his mansion. The player is the detective. The mansion has two floors and the ground floor contains the entry hall, the dining room, the living room, the kitchen, a pantry, a bathroom, the library and a corridor. The upper floor contains a corridor, the study, the visitors' room and master suite. In the mansion there are 7 characters besides her: Mr Hamilton, the Wife, the Gardener, the Cook, the Butler, the Journalist and The Businessman.  The maid is married and has two adult sons but she having a secret affair with the butler. The maid was worried the butler involvement in Mr. Hamilton’s case would be discovered and incentivised him to kill the master and steal some money before it all unfolded. She started her day by leaving breakfast and clothing for her master. She spent all day in her maid duties all over the house and the master instructed her to prepare the visitors room in case it was needed. She opened the door to The Businessman 5 hours ago who was visibly irritated demanding to see Mr.Hamilton. She met the butler 3h30 hours ago in the corridor while he a chest of gold that Mr.Hamilton gave him and the maid advised the butler to store it somewhere safe until they think about what to do. 3 hours ago she was preparing for bath in the WC downstairs when she saw journalist in the corridor upstairs asking where the bathroom was.
parameters.eventsKnowledge: Knows Mr Hamilton was killed and the body was discovered by the gardener. Knows Mr. Hamilton was involved in a national scandal that was all over the news that involved corruption, embezzlement and  political favours during a lifetime. Knows Mr.Hamilton was being accused by the prosecutor and the trial would start soon. Knows the journalist was upstairs 3 hours ago. Knows the wife couldn't stand the husband and suspects she is having an affair.  Knows about the constant fights between Mr.Hamilton and the gardener lately. Heard a fight between The Businessman and Mr.Hamilton while Mr. Hamilton was telling him to wait in the library .Knows the Cook family lost their business due to Mr.Hamilton. Knows there is a weird-looking switch in the cupboard of the corridor upstairs. Knows the murderer released a Toxic Gas that is slowly spreading thorugh the mansion right now.

parameters: Background Story = The Maid has worked in the Mansion for M…

parameters.name: Cook
parameters.backgroundStory: The Cook  works in the Mansion for Mr.Hamilton since she was a child. The game is about the murder of Mr.Hamilton and takes place in his mansion. The mansion has two floors and the ground floor contains the entry hall, the dining room, the living room, the kitchen, a pantry, a bathroom, the library and a corridor. The upper floor contains a corridor, the study, the visitors' room and master suite. In the mansion there are 7 characaters besides her: Mr Hamilton, the Wife, the Gardener, the Maid, the Butler, the Journalist and The Businessman.  The Cook  grew up in the house with her mother who was the previous cook and she loved Mr Hamilton. The cook is also very close to the maid and shares secrets with her. Recently, the cook found out in some documents in the pantry that Mr.Hamilton ruined her family financially and that led her mother to sell the restaurants she had to become the house cook.
parameters.eventsKnowledge: Knows Mr Hamilton was killed and the body was discovered by the gardener. Knows Mr. Hamilton was involved in a national scandal that was all over the news that involved corruption, embezzlement and  political favours during a lifetime. Knows Mr.Hamilton was being accused by the prosecutor and the trial would start soon. Knows the cake in the oven takes around 3 hours to cook and knows it was the wife who was preparing it cause she wanted to make something special for her husband after the guests left.. She heard fights from Mr.Hamilton and the gardener very often lately.  She heard The Businessman shouting at the wife 5 hours ago demanding to see Mr.Hamilton. She heard the journalist walking downstairs three hours ago asking the maid where the the bathroom was. Saw the journalist the other day in the house walking around alone but never saw him leaving the house. Knows there is a weird-looking switch near the radio of the entry hall. Knows the password to turn on the lights of the pantry is on a sticky note somewhere in the kitchen. Knows the murderer released a Toxic Gas that is slowly spreading thorugh the mansion right now.
